overviewCards.title: Achievements & Excellence
overviewCards.description: Over the years, our students have proudly represented the school at zonal and county levels.

overviewCards.title: Vibrant Clubs & Societies
overviewCards.description: Students participate actively in a diverse range of clubs designed to nurture talent, creativity, leadership, and personal growth.

overviewCards.title: Growth & Competitiveness
overviewCards.description: The school is steadily expanding its participation in inter-school tournaments and regional competitions.

orgCards.title: Leadership & Support Structure
orgCards.description: The Co-Curricular Department is led by a committed Head of Department (H.O.D) working closely with trainers, coaches, patrons, and student leaders to ensure accountability and effective organization.

orgCards.title: Our Co-Curricular Philosophy
orgCards.description: We believe that every student deserves an opportunity to discover and develop their talents. Our programs are rooted in values of integrity, discipline, respect, professionalism, and spiritual formation, guided by the ethos of the African Inland Church (AIC).

clubs.name: Music & Dance Club
clubs.description: Instrumental & Vocal Training • Dance • Cultural Performances

sports.name: Athletics
sports.description: Track and field events that build endurance, speed, and strength.

sports.name: Football
sports.description: One of our most popular sports fostering strategy, teamwork, and unity.

sports.name: Handball
sports.description: Fast-paced game that builds agility, precision, and high coordination.

sports.name: Netball
sports.description: A key sport for girls promoting teamwork, discipline, and focus.

sports.name: Volleyball
sports.description: A highly engaging sport enhancing speed, coordination, and power.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.description: Growing rapidly in popularity, improving reflexes and team strategy.

sports.name: Hockey
sports.description: Recently introduced, developing skill, precision, and tactical discipline.

sports.name: Rugby
sports.description: A strength-building sport that nurtures courage, resilience, and teamwork.

points.text: Known for boldness, resilience, and relentless drive.
Inspires others through enthusiasm, teamwork, and determination.
Excels in athletics, drama, and high-energy competitions.
Steadfast commitment to discipline and good conduct.
Strong performers in academics, leadership roles, and debates.
Known for excellence in science, innovation, and cultural activities.
Champions of academic strength and disciplined study habits.
Show courage and excellence in both academics and athletics.
Highly recognized for leadership, mentorship, and strategic thinking.

events.title: Inauguration Ceremony
events.description: This is one of the most important leadership events of the year, where new student leaders such as prefects, captains, and committee heads are formally sworn in. The ceremony symbolizes responsibility, integrity, and the trust placed on students by the school community.

events.title: Labour Day Celebration
events.description: A patriotic celebration highlighting the nation's journey, heritage, and freedom. Students participate in presentations, dances, speeches, debates, and exhibitions that showcase cultural pride and unity.

events.title: Cultural Day Celebration
events.description: One of the most anticipated events, the Cultural Day brings together students of all backgrounds to showcase music, drama, traditional dances, fashion shows, and creative arts. The day nurtures expression, diversity, and talent discovery.

events.title: Annual Celebration Day
events.description: A grand celebration marking the achievement of the school year. Academic awards, sports trophies, innovation showcases, and special performances make this a memorable event for parents, teachers, and students alike.

events.title: Sports Week
events.description: A full week of athletic competitions including track events, football, volleyball, basketball, netball, indoor games, and house competitions. This event fosters teamwork, discipline, and physical fitness—cornerstones of student wellbeing.
